name: Scary Maze Game
description:
Scary Maze Game has you and up to 5 others exploring a randomly generated maze trying to find the exit. But be careful walking around every corner as there is a monster that lurks within the maze.

What the game includes:
Regular mode with 6 hand crafted mazes
Random mode with infinite levels using a random maze generator
3 different enemies each with their own jump scare
6 player online support through steam. Play solo or with friends.
